title: Web Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Reinforced Concrete Structure Learning Course Utilizing Augmented Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Structural Mechanics and 2D Drawing Interpretation Skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can observe 3D models of concrete structures in an AR environment and accurately identify the position, spacing, and arrangement of rebars.
Learners can detect and correct three or more rebar placement errors in real-time with peer learners using collaborative AR tools.
Learners can improve accuracy in interpreting drawings by over 80% through mutual conversion between 2D drawings and AR models.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
